p: Nevertheless, the utility of using nâ€“3 fatty acid concentrations in the circulating compartment as indicators of compliance is supported by these findings. Therefore, an important point here is that all RCTs should indicate how compliance was monitored. Additionally, other types of research designs, such as crossover or sequential study designs, exist which should use the same criteria as RCTs in selecting the most appropriate circulatory pool in which fatty acid profiles will be analyzed.
